qas.question: What act allowed polytechnic schools to become universities?

answers.text: the Further and Higher Education Act 1992

qas.question: The Further and Higher Education Act 1992 allows polytechnics to award degrees without what organization's approval?

context: Polytechnics were granted university status under <a0_0>the Further and Higher Education Act 1992<a0_0/>. This meant that Polytechnics could confer degrees without the oversight of the national <a1_0>CNAA<a1_0/> organization. These institutions are sometimes referred to as post-1992 universities.
